import tensorflow as tf

cell = tf.nn.rnn_cell.BasicLSTMCell(500)

body:
So actually the message is suggesting that it doesn't need a seperate import, but its just namespaced onto the main tf module now.

```
import tensorflow as tf

cell = tf.nn.rnn_cell.BasicLSTMCell(500)
```
